sen.j: JR桂駅（じぇいあーるかつらえき）は、京都府京都市南区 (京都市)久世高田町に開業予定の、西日本旅客鉄道（JR西日本）東海道本線（JR京都線）の鉄道駅。
sen.e: JR Katsura Station is a station that is to be opened in Kuze-takada-cho, Minami Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, on the Tokaido Main Line (JR Kyoto Line), which is operated by West Japan Railway Company (JR West)

JR Katsura Station is a facility that is to be opened in Kuze-takada-cho, Minami Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, on the Tokaido Main Line (JR Kyoto Line), which is operated by the West Japan Railway Company (JR West).

JR Katsura Station is a facility that is to be opened in Kuze-takada-cho, Minami Ward (Kyoto City), Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, on the Tokaido Main Line (JR Kyoto Line), which is operated by the West Japan Railway Company (JR West).
sen.cmt: （京都市） を追加しました。

sen.j: 当初2005年度冬の開業を目指していたが、新駅周辺の都市再開発事業の遅れの影響や、新駅の地下をくぐり抜ける都市計画道路久世北茶屋線（京都府道201号中山稲荷線の一部）の拡張工事を受け、開業は延期となっていた。
sen.e: Though initially targeted for the winter of the fiscal 2005, its opening was delayed for the following reasons: It was affected by a dealy in the urban redeveloment work in the area around the new station, and is also affected by the work to expand the Kuzekitachaya road of the planned urban road (part of the Nakayam-Inari road of Kyoto Precture road 201) that is to run through under the site of the new station.

Though initially targeted for the winter of fiscal 2005, its opening was delayed because of a delay in the urban redevelopment work in the area around the new station, and because of the work to expand the Kuzekitachaya section of the planned urban road (part of the Nakayama-Inari Road of Kyoto Prefectural Road 201), which is to run under the site of the new station.

Although initially targeted for the winter of fiscal year 2005, its opening was delayed because of a delay in the urban redevelopment work in the area around the new station, and because of the work to expand the Kuzekitachaya section of the planned urban road (part of the Nakayama-Inari Line of Kyoto Prefectural Route 201), which is to run under the site of the new station.
sen.cmt: fiscal year としました。Though→Although としました。府道→prefectural route としました。

sen.j: 2006年10月現在、久世北茶屋線の函体構築が完成したことを受け、駅舎の建設工事が始まっている。
sen.e: As of October of 2006, construction of the station house started, corresponding to the completion of the box-based construction of the Kuzekitachaya road.
The construction of the station house started in October 2006, corresponding to the completion of the box-based construction of the Kuzekitachaya road.
The construction of the station house started in October 2006, corresponding to the completion of the box-based construction of the Kuzekitachaya road.

sen.j: しかし、2007年3月に予定されていた開業は、更に約1年半遅れの2008年秋になることが、2006年11月13日の京都市会補正予算審議から分かった。
sen.e: However, through the deliberation of the supplementary budget on November, 2006 in Kyoto municipal assembly, it was found that the start of the operation scheduled for March of 2007 would be postphoned by the autumn of 2008.

However, through the deliberation of the supplementary budget in November 2006 by the Kyoto Municipal Assembly, it was determined that the start of the operation scheduled for March 2007 would be postponed until the autumn of 2008.

However, through the deliberation of the supplementary budget on November 13, 2006 by the Kyoto Municipal Assembly, it was determined that the start of the operation scheduled for March 2007 would be postponed until the autumn of 2008, with a delay of a year and a half.
sen.cmt: 11月13日 としました。一年半遅れ を追加しました。

sen.j: なお、電車内に掲示されている路線図には、西大路駅～向日町駅間に新駅を追加記載できる余白がある。
sen.e: The route maps displayed in the trains are provided with a space for adding a new station between Nishioji Station and Mukomachi Station.
The route maps displayed in the trains contain a space for the addition of a station between Nishioji and Mukomachi stations.
The route maps displayed in the trains contain a space for the addition of a station between Nishioji and Mukomachi stations.

sen.j: 2006年1月31日に、「JR東海道本線（西大路駅～向日町駅間）新駅設置及び関連公共施設整備等に係る説明会」が、京都市およびJR西日本により開催されている。
sen.e: "A meeting to brief the construction of a new station between Nishioji Station and Mukomachi Station and the provision of related public facilities" was held on January 31, 2006, by Kyoto City and JR West.

"A meeting to brief the construction of a new station between Nishioji Station and Mukomachi Station and the provision of related public facilities" was held on January 31, 2006, by Kyoto City and JR West.

A meeting to brief the construction of a new station between Nishioji Station and Mukomachi Station and the provision of related public facilities' was held on January 31, 2006, by Kyoto City and JR West.

sen.j: あわせて、地域住民には、新駅関連公共施設及び新駅の地下をくぐり抜ける、久世北茶屋線計画図が配布された。
sen.e: In addition, drawings of the planned public facilities related to the new station and of the planned Kuzekitachaya road that is to run through under the site of the new station were distributed to the local residents there.

Additionally, drawings of the planned public facilities related to the new station and of the planned Kuzekitachaya road, which is to run under the site of the new station, were distributed to the local residents.

Additionally, drawings of the planned public facilities related to the new station and of the planned Kuzekitachaya road, which is to run under the site of the new station, were distributed to the local residents.

sen.j: なお、京都市およびJR西日本の説明では、正式駅名は未定との事である。
sen.e: Reportedly, it was said in the the briefing by Kyoto City and JR West that the official name of the new station was not decided.
Reportedly, it was stated in the briefing by Kyoto City and JR West that the official name of the new station was not decided.
Reportedly, it was stated in the briefing by Kyoto City and JR West that the official name of the new station was not decided.

sen.j: 新駅南西部には、麒麟麦酒の京都（桂）工場があった。
sen.e: The Kyoto (Katsura) factory of Kirin Brewery Company, Limited, was located in the southwest area of the new station site.
The Kyoto (Katsura) factory of Kirin Brewery Company, Limited, was located in the southwest area of the new station site.
The Kyoto (Katsura) factory of Kirin Brewery Company, Limited, was located in the southwest area of the new station site.

sen.j: しかし、事業計画の見直しにより工場閉鎖となったため、跡地において複合商業施設や高層住宅の建設など、都市再開発事業を予定している。
sen.e: However, the factory was closed after its business plan was reviewed, and now it is planned to redevelop the site for urban use, for example, to construct multi-purpose commercial facilities and/or to construct high-rise apartment buildings.

However, the factory was closed after its business plan was reviewed, and now it is planned to redevelop the site for urban use, such as to construct multipurpose commercial facilities and/or high-rise apartment buildings.

However, the factory was closed after its business plan was reviewed, and now it is planned to redevelop the site for urban use, such as to construct multipurpose commercial facilities and/or high-rise apartment buildings.

sen.j: なお、2005年5月より工場施設の取り壊しが行われ、既に跡地は更地となっているが、区画整理事業が遅れているため都市再開発事業は未着手である。
sen.e: With the work to demolish the factory facilities started in May of 2005, the site has already been vacant, but the work to redevelop the site for urbane use has not started, because no rezoning of the area has been decided yet.

Given the work to demolish the factory facilities started in May 2005, the site is already vacant, but the work to redevelop the site for urban use has not started because no rezoning of the area has been decided yet.

Given the work to demolish the factory facilities started in May 2005, the site is already vacant, but the work to redevelop the site for urban use has not started because no rezoning of the area has been decided yet.

sen.j: プラットホーム形状と配置1面2線（12両対応）の地上駅。
sen.e: It is located on the ground level, with an island platform serving two tracks (supporting 12-car trains).
It is located on the ground level, with an island platform serving two tracks supporting 12-car trains.
It is located on the ground level, with an island platform serving two tracks supporting 12-car trains.

sen.j: 設備は階段（2か所）、エレベーター（1基）、エスカレータ（1基）、多目的トイレ（2か所）。
sen.e: The facilites to be provided are two stairs (each placed at a different location), an elevator, an escalator and two muti-purpose lavatories (each placed at a different location).
The facilities to be provided include two stairways (each placed at a different location), an elevator, an escalator and two multipurpose lavatories (each in a different location).
The facilities to be provided include two stairways (each placed at a different location), an elevator, an escalator and two multipurpose lavatories (each in a different location).

sen.j: 改札は東西自由通路上に設置され、隣駅の向日町駅と違って東西から改札口に入れる予定。
sen.e: It is planned that an entrance/exit gate place is located on the free path, which is provided across the tracks in the east-west direction, to enable it to be used from both the east side and the west side of the station, unlike the situation in the adjacent Mukomachi Station.

It is planned that an entrance/exit gate will be located on the free path, which is provided across the tracks in the east-west direction, to enable usage from both the east side and the west side of the station, unlike the situation in the adjacent Mukomachi Station.

It is planned that an ticket gate will be located on the free path, which is provided across the tracks in the east-west direction, to enable usage from both the east side and the west side of the station, unlike the situation in the adjacent Mukomachi Station.
sen.cmt: 改札口→ticket gate としました。

sen.j: 付近の関連公共施設は、東西自由通路・駅前広場・駅前道路・JR東海道本線西側道・西自転車等駐車場・東自転車等駐車場である。
sen.e: Public facilities around the station are an east-west free path, a square in front of the station, a road in front of the station, the west side road of JR Tokai Main Line, a west-sede bicycle parking space and an east-side bicycle parking space.

Public facilities around the station include an east-west free path, a square in front of the station, a road in front of the station, the west side road of JR Tokai Main Line, a west-side bicycle parking area and an east-side bicycle parking area.

Public facilities around the station include an east-west free path, a square in front of the station, a road in front of the station, the west side road of JR Tokai Main Line, a west-side bicycle parking area and an east-side bicycle parking area.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 陸上自衛隊桂駐屯地
sen.e: The katsura millitary station of Japan Ground Self-Defense Force
The Katsura military station of the Japan Ground Self-Defense Force
sen.cmt: I THINK IT'S OFFICIALLY THE BRITISH SPELLING, "Defence."
sen.e: The Katsura military station of the Japan Ground Self-Defense Force

sen.j: 阪急京都本線洛西口駅まで600m
sen.e: The distance to Rakusaiguchi Station on the Hankyu Kyoto Main Line is 600 m.
The distance to Rakusaiguchi Station on the Hankyu Kyoto Main Line is 600 meters.
The distance to Rakusaiguchi Station on the Hankyu Kyoto Main Line is 600 meters.

sen.j: 10年以上前から予定されていたが、駅予定地の真下を通る京都府道201号中山稲荷線の改良工事の遅れや用地買収の目処がたたず、手付かずの状態だった。
sen.e: The construction of this station has been planned since more than 10 years ago, but nothing has been done because the work to imporve the Nakayama-Inari road of Kyoto Precture road 201, which is to run through under the planned site of the new station, was delayed and no prospect of acquiring necesary land space was seen.

The construction of this station has been planned for more than ten years, but nothing has been done because the work to improve the Nakayama-Inari section of Kyoto Prefectural Road 201, which is to run under the planned site of the new station, was delayed and no prospect of acquiring the necessary land space could be seen.

The construction of this station has been planned for more than ten years, but nothing has been done because the work to improve the Nakayama-Inari Line of Kyoto Prefectural Route 201, which is to run under the planned site of the new station, was delayed and no prospect of acquiring the necessary land space could be seen.
sen.cmt: 府道→prefectural route としました。

sen.j: また、阪急京都線洛西口駅より先に開業する予定となっていた。
sen.e: It was planned to start its operation before operation of Rakusaiguchi Station on the Hankyu Kyoto Line started.
It was planned to start its operation before Rakusaiguchi Station on the Hankyu Kyoto Line came into use.
It was planned to start its operation before Rakusaiguchi Station on the Hankyu Kyoto Line came into use.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。
